entry.title: nxducominer
entry.summary: A mining application on the Nintendo Switch for the cryptocurrencyduinocoin. Multithreaded with web dashboard and IoT integration.

entry.title: ps3dec-gui
entry.summary: Yet another GUI for PS3Dec. Built with Rust.

entry.title: arduino-ps3mapi
entry.summary: An Arduino library to monitor & control homebrewed PS3s running webMAN using PS3MAPI.

entry.title: ezDNS
entry.summary: A PS3 DNS configuration application that lets you save and quickly swap custom DNS profiles for different games and online revival projects.

entry.title: mcps3rtm
entry.summary: A CLI real time modding tool for the PS3 edition of Minecraft.

entry.title: vertex
entry.summary: A TCP/UDP BitTorrent tracker written in Python with support for modular database implementations, private/public modes and statistic tracking.

entry.title: webMAN-wallpaper
entry.summary: A Wallpaper Engine Web Wallpaper to display stats from your PS3 by scraping webMAN.

entry.title: nxcgol
entry.summary: An implementation of Conway's Game of Life for the Nintendo Switch.

entry.title: TrumpGolfTrack-Discord-Bot
entry.summary: Python Discord bot using Selenium to track Trumps golfing activity.

entry.title: JustPooped-Discord-Bot
entry.summary: A Discord bot written in Python that tracks your servers bathroom habits, with minigame and trivia integration.

entry.title: PSL1GHT Documentation
entry.summary: I have forked the PSL1GHT repo fromps3dev/PSL1GHT, updated the Doxygen configuration and published with GH Pages, which can be foundhere. I did this to have an up-to-date reference for my PS3 homebrew projects.

entry.title: DUCO Faucet retirement
entry.summary: faucet.tbwcjw.online has been retired as I don't have the required free time to maintain it in production, and would rather focus on other projects. It has since been open sourced, and archived onGitHub. Thank you everyone who used tbwcjw faucet!
